content: crate socks a knitting pattern the #cratesocks are simple ribbed socks with subtle twists in the ribbing pattern that create lovely texture and visual interest knitted cuff-down with a heel flap and gusset construction these socks offer an excellent fit and are perfect for sock knitting beginners or experienced knitters seeking a straightforward textured project the crate socks feature a woven ribbing stitch pattern throughout which gives the design its name this woven texture continues onto the heel flap for a practical yet delicate look while a wedge toe provides a neat finish more forgiving and flexible so the recommended ease is 3-6 cm / 1 25-2 5 negative ease to choose your size measure around the ball of your foot and subtract 3-6 cm / 1 25-2 5 more negative ease means the sock will hug your foot more snugly while less negative ease will give you a less stretched appearance in the texture foot and leg length can be knit to your preferred length gauge 34 sts & 48 row
